  52. /* always readable by all threads
  53.    written only by a single thread during STW periods */
  54. ‌typedef uintnat status;
  55. ‌struct global_heap_state {
  56.   status MARKED, UNMARKED, GARBAGE;
  57. };
  58. extern struct global_heap_state caml_global_heap_state;

  60. /* CR mshinwell: ensure this matches [Emitaux] */
  61. enum {NOT_MARKABLE = 3 << HEADER_COLOR_SHIFT};

  63. ‌Caml_inline int Has_status_hd(header_t hd, status s) {
  64.   return Color_hd(hd) == s;
  65. }

  67. ‌Caml_inline int Has_status_val(value v, status s) {
  68.   return Has_status_hd(Hd_val(v), s);
  69. }

  71. ‌Caml_inline header_t With_status_hd(header_t hd, status s) {
  72.   return Hd_with_color(hd, s);
  73. }

  75. ‌Caml_inline int is_garbage(value v) {
  76.   return Has_status_val(v, caml_global_heap_state.GARBAGE);
  77. }

  79. ‌Caml_inline int is_unmarked(value v) {
  80.   return Has_status_val(v, caml_global_heap_state.UNMARKED);
  81. }

  83. ‌Caml_inline int is_marked(value v) {
  84.   return Has_status_val(v, caml_global_heap_state.MARKED);
  85. }

  87. void caml_redarken_pool(struct pool*, scanning_action, void*);

  89. intnat caml_sweep(struct caml_heap_state*, intnat);


  92. /* must be called during STW */
  93. void caml_cycle_heap_stw(void);

  95. /* must be called on each domain
  96.    (after caml_cycle_heap_stw) */
  97. void caml_cycle_heap(struct caml_heap_state*);

  99. /* Heap invariant verification (for debugging) */
